DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Pain and Discomfort Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's pain and discomfort experienced during the past week.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Pain and Discomfort
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's pain and discomfort.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Concepts.definition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Property.preferredName: During Past Week Pain and Discomfort
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about an individual's pain and discomfort.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about an individual's pain and discomfort.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Health Utilities Index Pain and Discomfort Status
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of an individual's ability to hear.

PermissibleValues.value: Severe pain or discomfort that prevented most activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Severe Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Most Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Severe Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Most Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had severe pain or discomfort that prevented most activities.

Concepts.longName: Severe Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Most Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had severe pain or discomfort that prevented most activities.

PermissibleValues.value: Moderate to severe pain or discomfort that prevented some activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Moderate to Severe Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Some Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Moderate to Severe Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Some Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had moderate to severe pain or discomfort that prevented some activities.

Concepts.longName: Moderate to Severe Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Some Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had moderate to severe pain or discomfort that prevented some activities.

PermissibleValues.value: Moderate pain or discomfort that prevented some activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Moderate Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Some Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Moderate Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Some Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had moderate pain or discomfort that prevented some activities.

Concepts.longName: Moderate Pain or Discomfort that Prevented Some Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had moderate pain or discomfort that prevented some activities.

PermissibleValues.value: Mild to moderate pain or discomfort that prevented no activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Mild to Moderate Pain or Discomfort that Did Not Prevent Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Mild to Moderate Pain or Discomfort that Did Not Prevent Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had mild to moderate pain or discomfort, but it did not prevent activities.

Concepts.longName: Mild to Moderate Pain or Discomfort that Did Not Prevent Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had mild to moderate pain or discomfort, but it did not prevent activities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was free of pain or discomfort.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was free of pain or discomfort.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
